memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.

Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. We need to vote him out now to protect the town."
Diana: "Charlie, why are you so sure Bob is mafia? We just lost Alice and need to discuss properly before voting."
You: "Diana makes a good point. Charlie, why are you immediately accusing me without any discussion? That seems suspicious."
Diana: "I think we need to look at Charlie's behavior. Jumping straight to an accusation without evidence feels like mafia trying to create chaos. Let's vote carefully."
Charlie: "Bob is the mafioso. I investigated him last night and have proof. Delaying will only give him more chances to kill us. We must vote him out now to save Diana and the town."
You: "Charlie, if you're the detective, why didn't you reveal your role immediately? This feels like a desperate mafia play to get me voted out."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
